column2: Of course I miss them! What kind of question is that? Mom, my brothers, my sisters. Dad. *You can clearly see that the last word Sarah says comes out a bit strained.*
What? *Sarah stares at the camera suspiciously for a long time.* Oh, well… yeah. There is something. Dad's always been strict and cold. We don't get along too well.
I'm sorry for intruding in your personal affairs.
*She waves her hand.* Don't mention it. It's okay. Kids often fight with their parents, that stops when they get older, right? The important thing is that I miss him too.
Got it. Sorry for being so nosey again. Over and out.
